basics.name: Aurélien Scoubeau
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a creative and motivated individual who is always seeking new challenges and opportunities to learn. Rigorous and solution-oriented, I leverage my own experience to craft innovative ideas. I am at my best when working with a focused and engaged team.

work.position: Staff Software Engineer & Senior Frontend Developer
work.summary: As part of the web team, I own parts of our React frontend and my main area of attention is the highly dynamic home feed. Over time, we ensured a smooth transition over few React versions, the arrival of hooks, the migration from Enzyme to React Testing Library. I also manage a cross-platform templating technology for all our clients to use. To achieve this, I work closely with our UI/X team. Additionally, I maintain a dynamic webview for mobile clients so that they display charts in a consistent manner. I have been giving internal workshops about testing and facilitating communication to conquer roadblocks.

From point of sale projects to big online applications through static websites, everything runs in a browser nowadays. In that spirit, I selected a flexible set of libraries that work well together to bootstrap new projects as fast as possible. That includes mentoring people to bring them up to speed and managing our development power. The goal is to go from 0 to 100 in the least possible time.

Starting as a web developer, after moving a Django code base from Jython to CPython, I led efforts to drastically reduce rendering times of the whole system. I also led the creation of a micro-frontend for online ebook reading.

Getting started by learning the guts of a nig Django codebase, I took part in the creation of a decoupled frontend based on Backbone.js + jQuery + SASS. My Javascript skills grew a lot, as well as my understanding of frontend architectures and REST in general.
highlights: Part of a big team and a big company

work.summary: As a web agency, we completed a wide range of projects, including large Drupal websites and interactive promotional microsites. We utilized an agile approach to deliver projects quickly and efficiently.
highlights: Rapid application development with Yii and CakePHP
Content rich websites built with Drupal

work.summary: Initially hired as a trainee, I received excellent mentoring and gained valuable experience.
highlights: Object oriented programming in PHP5 + JOINs in PostgreSQL
Carried prepress and web graphic work

courses: Thesis : Informatique et sudoku, a NP-complete problem.
Conceptual : capacity to apply an inventive mind to real world constraints.
Visual : consciousness of an adapted communication to graphic languages and multimedia environment.
Technical : from graphic softwares to programming, face diversity and quick web and multimedia evolution.
Final work : Leçons toutes faites, a webapp built with Fusebox.

quotes.text: Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I understand.
If failure had no penalty success would not be a prize.

references.name: Lothar Schulz
references.reference: I had the pleasure to work with Aurelien in web project as part of a full fledged customer project. In a professional manner Aurelien bore the challenge of working with code he was new to with a lot of technical debt. He is an expert in Python and Django and considers always QA and development aspects as well as side effects to other teams. I'd love to work with Aurelien again.

references.name: Gabriel Camby
references.reference: Aurélien is a good lad on a human interaction level but development is where he shines. Thanks to his formation, he has great abstraction and optimisation skills which allows him to come up with well-thought-out procedures and algorithms. He has good development practices (e.g. useful code comments, meaningful branch strategy, etc.) and what matters a lot in this job: good intuition and resourcefulness.

references.name: Antoine Servais
references.reference: If I had three words to describe Aurélien, I will say clever, conscientious and Professional. Aurélien has the capacity to explain you lots of things in a very simple way. As a true web addict, Aurelien is open minded and really talented in his work.
